mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, username, password,address, gender, city,image,self_introduction, phone_number, email, bank_card_number, identity, create_time, update_time, state) VALUES (#{name}, #{username}, #{password},#{address}, #{gender}, #{city},#{image},#{selfIntroduction}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{bankCardNumber}, #{identity}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{state});
INSERT INTO account (user_id, balance, point, create_time, update_time) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), 0.0, 0, now(), now() );
mapper.update:
update user set
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
address = #{address},
image = #{image},
self_introduction = #{selfIntroduction},
city = #{city},
update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
update account set balance = balance + #{paid} , update_time = #{updateTime} where user_id in (select user_id from sub_merchant where id in (select store_id from product where id = #{productId}))
update sub_trade set success = #{success} , deal_time = #{dealTime} , reject_reason = #{rejectReason} where id = #{id}
